title: Google Pay and Beam works, but Pixel3 wont recognise NFC tags
content:
I have a Pixel3 where Google Pay and Beam all work, but I have some NFC tags that I know work (tested on a Pixel1) but the Pixel3 just doesn't register that they even exist.

I've attached a screenshot of the tag I'm using, this was from NFC Tools on the Pixel1.

Has anyone else had this problem? And recommendations to resolve?
